oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A truncated [Mn-12(III)] tetrahedron from oxime-based [(Mn3O)-O-III] building blocks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FROST, JM
SANZ, S
RAJESHKUMAR, T
PITAK, MB
COLES, SJ
RAJARAMAN, G
WERNSDORFER, W
SCHNACK, J
LUSBY, PJ
BRECHIN, EK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: SINGLE-MOLECULE MAGNETS
TEMPERATURE LANCZOS METHOD
GROUND-STATE
COMPLEXES
CHEMISTRY
CLUSTERS
SYMMETRY
SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The use of the novel pro-ligand H4L combining the complimentary phenolic oxime and diethanolamine moieties in one organic framework, results in the formation of the first example of a [Mn-12(III)] truncated tetrahedron and an extremely rare example of a Mn cage conforming to an Archimedean solid.
